name: Bevo Emberhoof
description1: Redeye: Place a -50 accuracy mantle [0 pips]
description2: Smoldering Cat: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT [1 pip]
description3: Blazing Construct: Deal 200 damage and place a -50 accuracy mantle if you have a trap [2 pips]
description4: Smog Bats: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and place a -50 accuracy mantle [2 pips]
description5: Ruby Shark: Deal a 375, 3 turn DoT [3 pips]
description6: Infernal Construct: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and a 200, 4 turn DoT if enemy has a shield [5 pips]
description7: Noxious Golem: Deal 200 damage and a 200, 4 turn DoT if enemy has a shield [2 pips]
description8: Cauterize: Remove a DoT and place a 50, 2 turn HoT [1 pip]
description9: Bombardier Beetle: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and detonate dot if enemy has a stun block [4 pips]
description10: Bargain of Brass: Take 250 damage and deal a 300, 3 turn DoT to all enemies [3 pips]

name: Gorok Icecleaver
description1: Chill Bug: Deal 50 damage and clear enemy blade for a 50 weakness [0 pips]
description2: Bracing Breeze: Place a 75 shield and a 2 turn stun resist bubble [1 pip]
description4: Winter's Fury: Place a 225 trap and clear mantle on self to deal 75 damage [3 pips]
description5: Bracing Wind: Place 100 shield and 2 turn stun resist bubble for whole team [4 pips]
description6: Cold Harvest: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and clear enemy blade for 75 weakness [5 pips]
description7: Winter's Ward: Place a 100 shield and remove mantle [1 pip]
description8: Sultan Of Sleet: Deal 150 damage and taunt if your team has a minion [2 pips]
description9: Bitter Chill: Deal 225 damage and gain a 125 shield if enemy has a trap [3 pips]
description10: Freeze The Heart: Deal 150 damage and clear enemy blade to stun them [2 pips]

name: Nimborr
description1: Ionization: Place a 75 blade and activate a HoT [0 pips]
description2: Brewing Storm: Add 2 cards (125 damage 1 pip) to deck and clear DoT for a 75 blade [0 pips]
description3: Triton Shock: Deal 100 damage and clear enemy HoT to place a -50 heal mantle on enemy [1 pip]
description4: Repair Bear: Place a 225, 3 turn HoT and clear DoT for a 125 heal blade [2 pips]
description5: Storm Sprite: Deal 200 damage and gain a 100 heal blade if enemy has a mantle [2 pips]
description6: Glowbug Swarm: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and gain a 100 heal blade if enemy has a mantle [5 pips]
description7: Stormfront: Add 2 cards (125 damage 1 pip) to whole team's decks and clear DoT for a 125 blade [3 pips]
description8: Refreshing Mist: Place a 150, 3 turn HoT and heal 50 HP if target has a blade [1 pip]
description9: Zeus' Judgement: Deal 300 damage and steal enemy HoT [3 pips]
description10: Refreshing Rain: Place a 200, 4 turn HoT on whole team and heal 50 if they have a blade [4 pips]

name: Asterion Lorehorn
description1: Metal Minion: Summon a minion [0 pips]
description2: Rust Bat: Steal a shield then deal 100 damage [1 pip]
description4: Borrowed Time: Place a 150 shield and clear trap for 100 shield to self [2 pips]
description5: Cast-Iron Aegis: Target minion to give whole team a 200 shield [3 pips]
description6: Grasping Ghilan: Steal a shield then deal 100 damage to all enemies [4 pips]
description7: Multiply Armor: Push shield and gain a 50 shield if target has a shield [0 pips]
description8: Lingering Wail: Deal 225 damage and place a -50 accuracy mantle if enemy has a DoT [3 pips]
description9: Stoke The Flames: Target minion and give enemy team -50 accuracy mantles [2 pips]
description10: Cursed Medusa: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and clear enemy shield to stun [6 pips]

name: Tauryn Grazaur
description1: The Worm Turns: Deal 50 damage and push DoT onto enemy [0 pips]
description2: Bio-Gnomes: Deal 75 damage and gain a 75 heal blade if enemy has a DoT [1 pip]
description3: Radiant Boon: Heal for 150 HP [2 pips]
description4: Bull Rush: Deal 225 damage and heal 100 HP self if you have a blade [3 pips]
description5: Unicorn Blessing: Place a 500, 4 turn HoT and double pip, 4 turn bubble if enemy team has a minion [4 pips]
description6: Arboreal Vengeance: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a -50 accuracy mantle if enemy team has a minion [5 pips]
description7: Tears Of Mourning: Place afterlife on enemy that gives enemy team a -50 accuracy mantle [0 pips]
description8: Propitious Pixie: Place a 300, 4 turn HoT and clear a DoT for a 150, 3 turn HoT [2 pips]
description9: Metal Mangler: Deal 150 damage and a 200, 4 turn DoT [3 pips]
description10: Rite Of Spring: Heal 100 HP and place a 300, 4 turn HoT if target has a blade [2 pips]

name: Galkoth
description1: Pariah's Curse: Deal 50 damage and expel any minion from field [0 pips]
description2: Fanaticism: Place a protected 75, 3 turn HoT and a 50 blade [1 pip]
description3: Overruled: Deal 200 damage and swap HoT / DoT [2 pips]
description4: Sanction: Deal 100 damage and place a protected 200, 4 turn HoT on self [2 pips]
description5: Embolden: Gift 3 pips and gain 1 pip to self if any team has a minion [3 pips]
description6: Just Cause: Place a protected 125, 5 turn Hot and a 100 blade to whole team [4 pips]
description7: Righteous Strength: Place a protected 200, 4 turn HoT and clear HoT / DoT for a pip [1 pip]
description8: Sweeping Sanction: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a protected 100, 4 turn HoT on whole team [5 pips]
description9: Reconciliation: Gift 2 pips and swap HoT / DoT [2 pips]
description10: Call Witness: Summon minion of enemy school [0 pips]
